title: Fix order status filtering, tab-specific metrics, and column ordering

requirements.text: Modify Total Orders tab to display only orders with status 'Pending'. When rows are selected and marked as ready, remove them from the Total Orders view immediately.

quotes: Total orders should show orders with status pending and when rows are selected to update it as ready, the row gets removed from total orders and moved to ready

acceptanceCriteria: Total Orders tab filters orders to show only status 'Pending'
After marking orders as ready, those orders disappear from Total Orders tab
Orders appear in Ready tab after status update

requirements.text: In Karigars tab, when viewing a specific karigar's pending orders and marking them as ready, remove those orders from the karigar's pending order list immediately.

quotes: Same way from Karigar tabs, if selected and marked as ready it should remove from Karigar pending order list and move to ready

acceptanceCriteria: Karigar detail view shows only pending orders for that karigar
After marking orders as ready, they are removed from karigar's pending list
Orders appear in Ready tab after status update

requirements.text: Update SummaryCards component to calculate and display metrics (Total Orders count, Total Weight, Total Quantity, Customer Orders count) based on the currently active tab's filtered data, not all orders.

quotes: The icons in dashboard ( Total orders. weight , qty, customer orders) should reflect true values as selected in current tab and keeps changing according to the tab

acceptanceCriteria: In Total Orders tab, summary cards show counts/totals for pending orders only
In Ready tab, summary cards show counts/totals for ready orders only
In Hallmark tab, summary cards show counts/totals for hallmark orders only
In Customer Orders tab, summary cards show counts/totals for CO type orders only
Metrics update immediately when switching tabs

requirements.text: Modify Customer Orders tab to filter and display only orders where order type is 'CO', excluding all other order types.

quotes: Customer order tab should only show order type *CO* and not any other type

acceptanceCriteria: Customer Orders tab displays only orders with type 'CO'
Orders with type 'RB' or other types are not visible in this tab

requirements.text: Reorder all table columns across all dashboard tabs to display data in this exact sequence: Generic name, Karigar name, wt, size, qty, design code, remarks, order number, type, product.

quotes: Display the data in the dashboard as in this sequence. ( in all tabs ) - Generic name, Karigar name, wt , size , qty. design code, remarks, order number, type, product

acceptanceCriteria: OrderTable component displays columns in specified order
Column order is consistent across Total Orders, Ready, Hallmark, Customer Orders, and Karigar detail tabs
All existing columns remain functional with new ordering

constraints: Do not modify backend order status logic or data models
Maintain existing bulk selection and status update functionality
Keep export functionality (Excel, PDF, JPEG) working with new column order
nonGoals: Changing order status workflow or adding new statuses
Modifying order ingestion or Excel parsing logic
Adding new tabs or removing existing tabs
